trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> property using linear interpolation between two values.
trans-unit.target: 通过在两个值之间使用线性内插，可以对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 属性的值进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 动画的时间段内更新的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape> a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color.
trans-unit.target: 动画效果可能十分微小，例如移动<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape>左边和右边或比较极端，如同时对其进行旋转并更改其颜色增大到其原始大小的 200 倍的对象的几个像素。

trans-unit.source: To create an animation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you associate an animation with an object's property value.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建在动画[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，你将动画对象的属性值与相关联。

trans-unit.source: Target Values
trans-unit.target: 目标值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation> class creates a transition between two target values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation>类将创建两个目标值之间的转换。

trans-unit.source: To set its target values, use its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其目标值，使用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: Properties specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的属性

trans-unit.source: Resulting behavior
trans-unit.target: 产生的行为

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设置为指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>的总和来指定的值的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性优先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关将多个动画应用到单个属性的信息，请参阅[关键帧动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation> class inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation> objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation>类继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation>对象具有一些特殊功能，其中包括以下： 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享，使只读的以提高性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 动画从头到尾播放一次所花的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> class that animates to the specified value over the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 类的新实例，该类在指定的持续时间内对指定值进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: The starting value for the animation is the base value of the property being animated or the output from another animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的起始值是正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或来自另一个动画的输出。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 动画从头到尾播放一次所花的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the animation behaves when it is not active.
trans-unit.target: 指定动画不处于活动状态时的行为。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> class that animates to the specified value over the specified duration and has the specified fill behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 类的新实例，该类在指定的持续时间内将动画处理至指定的值，并具有指定的填充行为。

trans-unit.source: The starting value for the animation is the base value of the property being animated or the output from another animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的起始值是正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或来自另一个动画的输出。

trans-unit.source: The starting value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 动画从头到尾播放一次所花的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> class that animates from the specified starting value to the specified destination value over the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 类的新实例，其在指定的持续时间内从指定的起始值到指定的目标值之间进行绘制动画。

trans-unit.source: The starting value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 动画从头到尾播放一次所花的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the animation behaves when it is not active.
trans-unit.target: 指定动画不处于活动状态时的行为。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> class that animates from the specified starting value to the specified destination value over the specified duration and has the specified fill behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 类的新实例，该类在指定的持续时间内从指定的起始值到指定的目标值之间进行动画处理，并具有指定的填充行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

trans-unit.source: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
trans-unit.target: 动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性时要进行动画处理"通过"一定量，而不是指定开始点或结束值的值。

trans-unit.source: You may also use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的属性

trans-unit.source: Resulting Behavior
trans-unit.target: 产生的行为

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设置为指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>的总和来指定的值的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**如果同时设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性优先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>对象。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: <*object* `By`="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>"/>
trans-unit.target: <*object* `By`="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>
trans-unit.target: <*对象* `By`="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ >

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object*>
trans-unit.target: \<*object*>

trans-unit.source: <*object*.`By`>
trans-unit.target: <*object*.`By`>

trans-unit.source: </*object*.`By`>
trans-unit.target: </*object*.`By`>

trans-unit.source: \</*object*>
trans-unit.target: \</*object*>

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The Point3Danimation is created with all properties set to their default value.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Point3Danimation 并将所有属性设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to this animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于此动画的缓动函数。

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to this animation.
trans-unit.target: 应用于此动画的缓动函数。

trans-unit.source: Easing functions allow you to create a variety of specialized animation effects including bouncing, spring oscillations, and various magnitude acceleration and deceleration animations.
trans-unit.target: 缓动函数可用于创建各种专用的动画效果包括会传来传去，弹簧振动以及各种的量值加速和减速的动画。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.EasingFunction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.EasingFunction" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the animation's starting value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置动画的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The starting value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的属性

trans-unit.source: Resulting Behavior
trans-unit.target: 产生的行为

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设置为指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>的总和来指定的值的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**如果同时设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性优先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>对象。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: <*object* `From`="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>"/>
trans-unit.target: <*object* `From`="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -

trans-unit.target: <*对象* `From`="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ >

trans-unit.target: \<*object*>

trans-unit.target: <*object*.`From`>

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the animation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />，用来生成动画所使用的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation" /> 确定。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.
trans-unit.target: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不 <c4 1> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则值为前一的组合图层的属性的动画的输出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应将目标属性的当前值添加到此动画的起始值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应将目标属性的当前值与此动画的起始值相加，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the animation has only one of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties set, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画的只有一个其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性集，将此属性设置不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为**true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, and is shared by various derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖属性是异常，因为它的标识符字段来自于<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，并由共享各种派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the animation accumulates its values when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果动画累计它的值时其<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。

trans-unit.source: otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“false”。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to **true**, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为**true**，该动画的输出时，值仅累计该动画的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 它不会不会累计其值，因为其父重复重新启动时，或因为其时钟已重新启动从<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, and is shared by various derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖属性是异常，因为它的标识符字段来自于<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，并由共享各种派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the animation's ending value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置动画的结束值。

trans-unit.source: The ending value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的结束值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的属性

trans-unit.source: Resulting Behavior
trans-unit.target: 产生的行为

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>属性设置为指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的值的动画<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>的总和来指定的值的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**如果同时设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.To%2A>属性优先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimation.By%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Point3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>对象。
